function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on foreign aid and outside experts","Impact":"Lack of country-level ownership and sustainability of public health agenda","Mitigation":"Increase country-level ownership of public health agenda and reduce reliance on foreign aid and outside experts","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Countries receiving foreign aid and outside experts","Owner":"Government, policymakers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Complex dynamics and interconnectivities of global changes","Impact":"Limited understanding and prediction of disease scenarios","Mitigation":"Improve data quality and quantity, enhance cross-scale interaction modeling, and develop better feedback loop analysis","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling software, advanced data collection tools","People":"Global health organizations, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Inevitability of increased vulnerability, infection, and epidemics due to global change","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemics and infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Enhance current control initiatives, promote economic development, and improve disease monitoring and surveillance","Technologies":"Disease monitoring and surveillance systems, epidemiological modeling tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments, international health agencies"}]}
